tool_description: The Netflix  orginal Series Top 100 API contains information on movies, including the release year, duration, cast, brief summaries, and ratings . This data can be used for recommendation systems, data analysis, and research.
name: Netflix Original Series Top 100 (ranked)
title: Netflix Original Series Top 100 (ranked)

api_list.name: By Filter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://netflix-original-series-top-100-ranked.p.rapidapi.com/uMEJkR/series?lister-item-header=value"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netflix-original-series-top-100-ranked.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
